unnormalised: Hey, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Hope he's back soon! Remember his heroics against Australia back in 2019? Doctor's at AIIMS must be working overtime. Last I heard, it was a shoulder issue. Praying it isn't too serious. Getting flashbacks to that "Lagaan" moment, needing everyone on the field.  Come on Dhawan, jaldi karo! Need him for the next series!
normalised: Hey, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Hope he's back soon! Remember his heroics against Australia back in two thousand and nineteen? Doctor's at A I I M S must be working overtime. Last I heard, it was a shoulder issue. Praying it isn't too serious. Getting flashbacks to that "Lagaan" moment, needing everyone on the field. Come on Dhawan, jaldi karo! Need him for the next series!
